title: Tao Geoghegan Hart and His ‘No Regrets’ Gamble for the Tour de France
content:
'Cycling at this level is finite ... I don’t have another 10 years': Brit drops Ineos for Lidl-Trek in hunt for grand tour glory – will it pay off?

Read the full article at Tao Geoghegan Hart and His ‘No Regrets’ Gamble for the Tour de France on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
